## BaseDatamodel.beforeInsert() method

Execute steps before the document will be inserted. Will be executed by [BaseDAO](./clm-core.basedao.md) and should not be executed by it's own. Similar to mongoose pre-save-hook

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @virtual */
beforeInsert(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
